Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #413237 - Content Aware Protection Problem - [Karaman Tava]

TextBody:
Hello Yagiz,

Thank you for your time in today's session. 

In the meeting we have managed to solve the issue reported, by adding to policy denylist the file extension and to the policy allowlist the email domain. 

I will proceed with the closure of this case. Should you require any further assistance or additional information, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Have a nice day ahead!

Best regards,
__________________
